cimunit_barrier_t cimunit_event::condition_barrier

Barrier associated with the event in case it is used as a condition event.

Definition at line 43 of file cimunit_event.h.

BOOL cimunit_event::is_action

Is this event an action event? If so, it may block when it is fired. If not, it will not block.

Definition at line 58 of file cimunit_event.h.

const char* cimunit_event::thread_name

Textual name of the thread, or NULL if not associated with a thread
